text: Hello.  My team is doing development work against several developer portals.  Our application uses quite a few custom properties.  I know how to export the properties; is there any way to import the property definitions into a new portal?  Thank you in advance for any advice you may have.
Hi James! I'm a product manager at HubSpot, I might have something that can help. Mind sending me a DM with your account ID so I can take a look?
Has anyone run into the issue of HubSpot blocking and reviewing publishing of pages in a test account?  Making it difficult to QA app development
